channel.title: Npc appearance problem

item.title: Npc appearance problem
item.dc:creator: @KaptainKoolAidz KaptainKoolAidz
item.description:
@KaptainKoolAidz wrote:

I’m trying to add an item that when worn transformes you into an NPC’s appearance.
I got it to change into an npc but i cant designate which one.
Any idea’s? I’m running on a delta source.

heres what i have.

if(wearID == 589){
npcID = 1;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (wearID == 589 == false){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic
